{{Wired embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=PLE500 |revision= |upc=745883597703 |ean= |asin=B00HRO2CH6 |price= |est_release_date=07/11/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=Powerline Adapter |fcc_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA7450 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV2 |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=48:F8:B3 }} {{TagLine|Powerline 1-port Gigabit Ethernet Adapter}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-PLEK500/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|pid=01t80000003bx4mAAA}}
The PLE500 is sold in pairs of two as the '''PLEK500''' kit.
*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32164-homeplug-av2-head-to-head ''HomePlug AV2 Head-To-Head'' - Review/Comparison on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Per '''SNB''', this device (and the '''ZyXEL''' PL5205 it is being compared to) :is based on the ''[[QCA]]'' QCA7450 + AR1540 chipset. :On the label... :48:F8:B3 OUI, ''Made in China'', 100-240VAC 50/60Hz, 0.1A power req. *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-news/32131-linksys-fields-first-homeplug-av2-adapters ''Linksys Fields First HomePlug AV2 Adapters'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Posted 2013-07-11, noted list price is $129.99
*[http://homeplug.certapp.net/showcase/product/328/ ''HomePlug Certified''] ([http://homeplug.certapp.net/showcase/product/325/ and also under '''Wistron NeWeb''''s name])
